house_listing.house_description: This condominium built in 1992 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car attached garage and approximately 6170 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room. Features include fireplace, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Fisher Island Real Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Foyer, Intercom System, Kitchen Island, Pantry, Tennis Court(s),Walk-In Closet(s), Wet Bar
